lead.p: toUTCString – Converts a Date object to a string.

description.p: Interpreters might implement the result of toTimeString to give different return values, it is recomended to use the toLocaleString method instead.

example.heading: toUTCString example
example.code: var date = new Date(); console.log(date.toUTCString()); // Returns a string representation of the given date and time.
